input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Spread Collar Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Tailored Fit No Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Check Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Microcheck Cotton Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Microcheck Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Report Collection Men's 4X Stretch Slim Fit Microcheck Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Ultrasoft Wrinkle-Free Brushed Cotton Long-Sleeve'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Infinite Slim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's BeanFlex Twill Long-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Women's Relaxed Fit Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Long-Sleeve Performance Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Chambray Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Plaid Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Signature Long-Sleeve Cotton Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Easy Care Trim Fit Check Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Stripe Dress Shirt'
  - Name='DANIEL HECHTER Men's Herringbone Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Women's Relaxed Fit Long-Sleeve Pinpoint Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Herringbone Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Victor Emmanuel Modern Fit Tech Stretch Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Wrinkle-Free Kennebunk Sport Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Signature Donegal Long-Sleeve Twill Flannel Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Flannel Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Spread Collar Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar core product type (dress shirt), slim fit, and spread collar match key specifics of the reference product. Twill is a common dress shirt fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End Men's Tailored Fit No Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Direct match in function, construction, and core features—no iron/dress shirt/tailored fit. Closest possible competitor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Check Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit dress shirt is very relevant, though 'check' suggests a pattern, which isn't core, and no mention of non-iron.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Microcheck Cotton Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit, cotton, and dress shirt all align. Microcheck is not critical, though non-iron is not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Microcheck Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit dress shirt is highly relevant, microcheck not central, and fabric/non-iron not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Report Collection Men's 4X Stretch Slim Fit Microcheck Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt matches well on silhouette and function; stretch is an additional feature and non-iron is not mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Ultrasoft Wrinkle-Free Brushed Cotton Long-Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-free and long-sleeve match to some extent, but 'brushed cotton' and lack of dress shirt language indicate a more casual shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Infinite Slim Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt construction is very similar, but non-iron feature is not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A direct competitor: non-iron, dress shirt, twill (common fabric), high match on core features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Direct match: non-iron dress shirt with no details suggesting otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's BeanFlex Twill Long-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Twill and long-sleeve noted, but not presented as a dress shirt and likely more casual due to 'BeanFlex' descriptor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Women's Relaxed Fit Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different gender and more casual 'Oxford' style; relaxed fit is less relevant to the marketed dress shirt for men.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Long-Sleeve Performance Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve format is aligned, but 'performance shirt' typically suggests a non-dress, more casual, or active use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Chambray Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chambray shirts have a casual construction and appearance, divergent from a semi-spread collar dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Plaid Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'Untucked fit' and 'plaid' strongly indicate a casual product not matching the dress shirt silhouette or use case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Signature Long-Sleeve Cotton Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve cotton shirt may be worn in some formal situations, but likely not constructed as a dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Easy Care Trim Fit Check Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit dress shirt aligns closely; 'easy care' suggests wrinkle resistance, which is similar to non-iron.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Stripe Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with wrinkle-resistant feature closely matches core dress shirt function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: DANIEL HECHTER Men's Herringbone Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with a specific weave (herringbone) is extremely aligned with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Women's Relaxed Fit Long-Sleeve Pinpoint Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's sizing and relaxed fit oxford style are less relevant to the reference men's non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Herringbone Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit dress shirt is directly relevant in silhouette and use; herringbone is a slight variation, non-iron not mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Victor Emmanuel Modern Fit Tech Stretch Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern fit dress shirt matches well for fit and application, 'tech stretch' is a slight deviation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Wrinkle-Free Kennebunk Sport Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-free feature matches and traditional fit aligns somewhat, but 'sport shirt' generally indicates a less formal construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Signature Donegal Long-Sleeve Twill Flannel Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flannel and 'Donegal' suggest a very casual shirt, not constructed as a non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Flannel Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flannel is a casual fabrication and construction very distinct from non-iron dress shirts.
